name: @johnlindquist/file-forge
description: File Forge is a powerful CLI tool for deep analysis of codebases, generating markdown reports to feed AI reasoning models.

scripts.test:cli:exclude: pnpm build && vitest run test/cli.test.ts --test-name-pattern 'exclude logic'
scripts.verify:bin: pnpm build && [ -f dist/index.js ] || (echo 'dist/index.js not found' && exit 1)
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm lint && pnpm build:check && pnpm verify:bin
scripts.check:include: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js src
scripts.check:include-file: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js .npmrc
scripts.check:include-external: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js /Users/johnlindquist/dev/kit/package.json
scripts.check:graph: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -g src/graph.ts
scripts.check:clipboard: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/graph.ts -y
scripts.check:name: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src --name MY_PROJECT
scripts.check:markdown: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js --include src --markdown
scripts.check:help: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js --help
scripts.check:full: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/graph.ts
scripts.check:templates: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js --list-templates
scripts.check:template:explain: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/templates.ts --template explain
scripts.check:template:document: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/templates.ts --template document
scripts.check:template:refactor: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/index.ts --template refactor
scripts.check:template:optimize: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/graph.ts --template optimize
scripts.check:template:render:worktree: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/graph.ts --render-template worktree --pipe
scripts.check:template:test: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/cli.ts --template test
scripts.check:template:fix: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/outputFormatter.ts --template fix
scripts.check:template:plan: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/cli.ts --template plan --exclude test/fixtures --exclude .husky
scripts.check:template:pr: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/cli.ts --template pr --exclude test/fixtures --exclude .husky
scripts.check:template:branch: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js -i src/cli.ts --template branch --exclude test/fixtures --exclude .husky
scripts.check:config: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js --config
scripts.check:open: pnpm build && pnpm exec node dist/index.js --open

author: John Lindquist
